name: Tabi Vs Tord
description:
After Gilfriend and Boyfriend meet Tabi, he will do everything possible to complete his revenge, but no one imagined that Tord would be there, so after destroying the whole place, Tord will arrive without imagining that Gilfriend and Boyfriend would be part of it. , but he will be so mad at Tabi for interrupting him, so Tord will take Boyfriend's place in the third song. 

You can play as Tord in the third song.
